name: Hotline Eddie
description:
Made during the 2nd Annual MOONMOON gamejam. This was a 72hour gamejam with the Horror theme.

A top down shoot 'em up where you play as Eddie, MOONMOON's very cute cat, trying to get out of a park where strange events are occuring.

Controls are;

  • WASD to move
  • Shift to run/dash
  • Mouse movement to move the cursor
  • Left mouse button to shoot

The games source can be found here;

https://github.com/ruudschouten/Hotline-Eddie

Credits for sounds and music can be found here;

https://github.com/ruudschouten/Hotline-Eddie/blob/master/AUDIO%20CREDITS.md
